name: The Time Man
description:
Being a gangster is, eh, no joke.  Especially whens you've got the power to turn backs time.

In this fighting arcade game, you play as a gangster time lord who's been sent out to clear out a rival gang.  But things don't quite go as planned.  You've got to last as long as you can as you punch, block, and time travel your  way through  never-ending battles.
